/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their facades painted in shades of white and gray, reflecting the urban architecture of the city. Cars and buses are parked along the side of the road, adding to the dynamic nature of the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. The sun shines brightly, casting shadows and highlighting the details of the buildings and vehicles.
